body_html: I assume that you're using this on GPU. For BatchNorm, we do have an op in XLA, and lately Justin Lebar tried it with the GPU backend of XLA using cuDNN, but concluded that raw XLA is actually faster than cuDNN for this operation, IIRC. So that may also be true for batch RE-normalization at this point. Assigning over to Justin to comment on the GPU angle on this.
